messages.body: Akamai shares slide despite upside Q3 report https://seekingalpha.com/news/3626905-akamai-shares-slide-despite-upside-q3-report $AKAM

links.title: Akamai shares slide despite upside Q3 report (NASDAQ:AKAM)
links.description: Akamai (NASDAQ: AKAM) shares are down 4.6% AH despite Q3 beats with revenue up 12% Y/Y to $793M and $1.31 EPS. Web Division sales were up 8% Y/Y to $418M. Media and Carrier revenue increased 16% to $375M. Cloud Security Solutions rose 23% to $266M. U.S. revenue increased 6% and International by 20%.

links.title: Unusual Volume Losers Today - Down On High Relative Volume (RVol) | NYSE, NASDAQ and AMEX
links.description: Unusual volume losers are stocks that are moving lower on unusually high volume. Increased volume flows are correlated with volatility. A heightened volume indicates something is going on today and that the stock is "in play". A stock moving down on unusually high volume typically implies distribution of the stock.
